string.value: #b#p1002100##k, who lives in Lith Harbor, wants to join the MapleStory 3rd Anniversary Bonanza.. I better help #b#p1002100##k make her way to the party.

#b#p1002100##k says she can't go to the party until she takes care of the errands her dad gave her. I better help #b#p1002100##k make it to the party. 

#o2230100# #r#a93881##k
#o3230100# #r#a93882##k 
#r!Warning : Do not lose #b#t1002508##k.
After helping #b#p1002100##k in her quest to go to the party, she strengthened my #b#t01002508##k as promised.

Hey, isn't that the #b#t01002508##k for the 3rd anniversary of MapleStory? I really wanted to go to the party myself, but my dad's not letting me go. He's very strict and protective of me. Not only that, but I haven't finished doing errands for him. Can you help me go to the party by helping me take care of the errands? If you can, then I'll upgrade the #b#t01002508##k that you have right now. Don't worry, I studied this, and I know what I'm doing.

My dad told me to take out some monsters that are bothering the travelers from their journey. The problem is, I'm too scared to face them myself. The monsters he asked me to take out are one-eyed lizards, and they really freak me out. I can't even look at them straight. Please help me slay #b50 #o2230100#s and 50 #o3230100#s#k for me.
I really want to go to the party, too. Please help me take care of the errands!
Wow, you really did it. You didn't get hurt though, right? Good, because it's time to party! Oh yeah, as promised, I have just upgraded your #b#t01002508##k. Hope you like it!
The monsters you'll have to slay for me are #b50 #o2230100#s and 50 #o3230100#s#k.
